long_description: The North Face Helmet balaclava is made from lightweight polyester fleece and is designed to be worn under a ski or climbing helmet for excellent protection from the cold while you're on the mountain. Design allows the front to be worn over the nose or pulled down under the chin. Stretchy front panels keep the balaclava snug on your face. Polyester/elastane fabric wicks moisture off of your skin and dries quickly.
